entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as maintaining a rigidly disapproving expression and refusing to talk if Harry uses the Muffliato spell on anyone in the vicinity. ("amusing was Hermione, who main tained a rigidly disapprov- ing expression throughout and refused to talk at all if Harry had used the Muffliato spell on anyone in the vicinity.")

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as trying to examine a book more closely and having difficulty with non-verbal spells. ("Sitting up in bed, Harry turned  the book sideways so as to examine more closely the scribbl ed instructions for a spell ")

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is described as snoring loudly while the wind and sleet pounded on the windows. ("While the wind and sleet pounded relentlessly on the win- dows and Neville snored loudly , Harry stared at the letters in brackets.")

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is described as being quick to comment on Harry's difficulty with non-verbal spells. ("Harry rather doubted he would be able to bring off this particular spell; he was still having difficulty with non-verbal spells, something Snape had been quick to comment on in every DADA class.")

entities.name: the prince
entities.description: The Prince is described as being a more effective teacher than Snape. ("On the other hand, the Prince had proved a much more effective teacher than Snape so far.")
